Attacks.Name: Harden
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains one additional defense die for the rest of the turn. If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character gains an additional power.

Attacks.Name: Poison Sting
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Shed Skin
Superpowers.Effect: During the Cleanup Phase, remove one special condition from this character.

Attacks.Name: Bug Bite
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character heals 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Adaptability
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is attacked, it may change one of its blank results to a hit result.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Beedrill character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
